related_questions.question: What is ecommerce affiliate?

related_questions.question: Can I do affiliate marketing on Shopify?
related_questions.snippet: What is affiliate marketing? Well, take it from Shopify's own encyclopedia entry: Affiliate marketing is an online sales tactic that lets a product owner increase sales by allowing others targeting the same audience — “affiliates” — to earn a commission by recommending the product to others.19 sep. 2018

related_questions.question: What is an Amazon affiliate store?
related_questions.snippet: An Amazon affiliate store is an online store that promotes products listed for sale on Amazon.com. As a store owner, you send traffic to Amazon by adding your affiliate links to the products. Users are redirected to Amazon to complete the purchase, and you earn an affiliate commission on each sale.14 feb. 2019
